sentences.en: Boxing is a test of skill and technique, rather than brute strength.
sentences.cn: 拳击考验的是技能和技术，不是蛮力。

sentences.en: Brute force was used to put down the revolt.
sentences.cn: 使用残忍的武力平息反叛.

sentences.en: Custer was an idiot and a brute and he deserved his fate.
sentences.cn: 卡斯特是个白痴，是个残暴的家伙，他罪有应得。

sentences.en: General Stilwell had told Roosevelt the brute fact at Cairo.
sentences.cn: 史迪威将军在开罗已经把这个赤裸裸的事实告诉了罗斯福.

sentences.en: He is a brute to his children.
He used brute force to take control.
sentences.cn: 他靠暴力获得了统治权。

sentences.en: He was a great brawny brute of a man.
sentences.cn: 他是个魁梧壮实、粗野的人。

sentences.en: He would not be such a brute as to cross her.
sentences.cn: 他还不是那种毫无心肝的人,叫她这样心气不顺.

sentences.en: Leave go of my hair, you brute!
sentences.cn: 放开我的头发, 你这个可恶的人!

sentences.en: Man has struggled long against the brute forces of nature.
sentences.cn: 长期以来,人类一直在同无情的自然力作斗争.

sentences.en: The brute fact is that the situation will not improve.
sentences.cn: 情况不会好转，这是赤裸裸的事实。

sentences.en: The brute guarding him beat him to a pulp.
sentences.cn: 那个看守他的凶汉把他打得一塌糊涂.

sentences.en: The burly brute swaggered forward, towering over me, and shouted.
sentences.cn: 五大三粗的恶汉趾高气扬地走过来，居高临下地对我咆哮着。

sentences.en: They used brute force to break open the door.
sentences.cn: 他们靠蛮劲把门撞开了.

sentences.en: We were all up against brute facts.
sentences.cn: 我们都要面对无情的事实.

sentences.en: You are a brute to keep it from me.
sentences.cn: 你把这件事瞒着我,真可恶.

words.tran_cn: 残忍的；野蛮的，不讲理的
粗野的；残忍的；野兽般的
残酷地对待；使像野兽般残忍，使变得残酷无情

trans.tran_cn: 残忍的，畜生的，动物的，无理性的

trans.tran_en: a man who treats people in an unkind, cruel way
